description:
Want to attract new customers and drive more sales? Learn how to create killer landing pages without coding — the ultimate landing page course, by GetResponse and Peep Laja, entrepreneur and conversion optimization expert.

If you're directing clicks to your home page, you're missing out on opportunities. An optimized landing page can generate 47% more sales than a typical home page.

After taking this course, you'll know how to design landing pages for sales, opt-ins, thank-you confirmations, and webinars — web pages that get visitors to take action NOW. We'll cover everything from creating an irresistible lead magnet to landing page anatomy, from integrated web forms to embedded video. And on top of that you'll learn how to avoid top 20 landing page mistakes.

OK, what if you're not a designer or a programmer? Inside GetResponse Landing Page Creator, you'll find a complete suite of tools for designing top-notch landing pages in minutes. To try our smart, simple drag-and-drop editor, grab a 30-day free trial.

Whether you're a newbie or an experienced online marketer, you'll find actionable insights on how to:

  • Design landing pages that crush your sales goals
  • Generate web forms to build your marketing list fast
  • Create an irresistible lead magnet to attract ideal subscribers
  • Add images and videos that capture attention and get action
  • Write persuasive landing page copy that converts like crazy
  • Avoid top 20 landing page mistakes
title: Create Landing Pages that Convert — No Coding
